title: Coronavirus and Education - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/31/20
itunes:title: Coronavirus and Education - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/31/20
description:
George Noory and George Mason University economics professor Bryan Caplan explore his views on the drastic changes happening in education during the pandemic, and if online instruction or homeschooling is a better option.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
